data.rationale:
DBIx::SoSimple;

    The module is intended to be a simplified or dumbed down interface
    to DBI;

    The module dose not change DBI, it simply wraps a DBI connection in
    an instance of itself.

    The Module is purely object orientated, and provides several
    methods to quickly and easily retrieve information from the
    database.

    Since this is an extension of DBI that provides a simplified
    interface the name space "DBIx::SoSimple" sounds like a logical
    choice.
